pages.text: $(italic)FOR THE LOVE OF GOD,$() if you have your render distance higher than 7 while playing on my servers, there is absolutely no point, so please lower it to 7. $(br2)This does not affect the servers, but it causes the client (you) to lose a significant amount of frames. The only time this is an exception is if you have the mod Far Sight installed.
Otherwise, there's no point in having a render distance higher than 7 because you $(italic)will not see further than 7, EVER.$()
